spell.name: Causar Temor (UA)
entries: Despertes un perill de mort a la consciència d'una criatura a l'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa or become {@condition frightened} for the duration. A target with 25 hit points or fewer makes the saving throw with disadvantage. The spell has no effect on constructs or undead.

spell.name: Cerimònia (UA)
entries: You perform one of several religious ceremonies. When you cast the spell, choose one of the following ceremonies, the target of which must be within 10 feet of you throughout the casting.

entries.name: Expiació
entries: You touch one willing creature whose alignment has changed, and you make a DC 20 Saviesa ({@skill Insight}) check. On a success, you restore the target to its original alignment.

entries.name: Beneïr Aigua
entries: Toques un {@item vial|phb} d'aigua i la tornes {@item Holy Water (flask)|phb|holy water}.

entries.name: Majoria d'Edat
entries: You touch one humanoid old enough to be a young adult. Durant les properes 24 hores, quan l'objectiu faci un tirada d'habilitat, pot afegir-hi {@dice d4}. Una criatura només pot obtenir el benefici d'aquesta cerimònia un cop.

entries.name: Dedicació
entries: You touch one humanoid who would willingly convert to your religion or who wishes to be dedicated to your god's service. Durant les properes 24 hores, quan l'objectiu hagi de salvar, pot afegir-hi {@dice d4}. Una criatura només pot obtenir el benefici d'aquesta cerimònia un cop.

entries.name: Ritus Funeraris
entries: You bless one corpse within 5 feet of you. For the next 24 hours, the target can't become undead by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

entries.name: Investidura
entries: You touch one willing humanoid. Choose one 1st-level spell you have prepared and expend a spell slot and any material components as if you were casting that spell. The spell has no effect. Instead, the target can cast this spell once without having to expend a spell slot or use material components. If the target doesn't cast the spell within 1 hour, the invested spell is lost.

entries.name: Marriage
entries: Toques humanoides adults voluntaris a casar-se. For the next 24 hours, each target gains a +2 bonus to AC and saving throws while they are within 30 feet of each other. Una criatura només pot obtenir el benefici d'aquesta cerimònia un cop.

spell.name: Vira del Caos (UA)
entries: Descarregues una massa undulant d'energia caòtica a una criatura a l'abast. Tira a impactar un atac de conjur a distància. Si impactes, l'objectiu rep {@damage 2d8}. Tria un dels {@dice d8}s. El número determina la mena de dany:

Si tots els d8 donen el mateix número l'energia salta d'una criatura a una altra estigui a 30 peus de la primera. Fes una altra tirada d'impacte i una altra tirada de dany (que podria encadenar un altre salt). Una criatura només pot ser un objectiu un cop per llançament d'aquest conjur.

entriesHigherLevel.name: A Nivells Superiors
entries: Quan llances aquest conjur emprant una ranura de nivell 2 o superior, cada objectiu rep dany extra del tipus que toqui, incrementant en {@scaledamage 2d8|1-9|1d6} per cada nivell per sobre d'1.

spell.name: Cop de Ma (UA)
entries: You create a Tiny incorporeal hand of shimmering light in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The hand exists for the duration, but it disappears if you teleport or you travel to a different plane of existence.

When the hand appears, you name one major landmark, such as a city, mountain, castle, or battlefield on the same plane of existence as you. Someone in history must have visited the site and mapped it. If the landmark appears on no map in existence, the spell fails. Otherwise, whenever you move toward the hand, it moves away from you at the same speed you moved, and it moves in the direction of the landmark, always remaining 5 feet away from you.
If you don't move toward the hand, it remains in place until you do and beckons for you to follow once every {@dice 1d4} minutes.

spell.name: Ma Radiant (UA)
entries: You raise your hand, and burning radiance erupts from it. Each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Constitució saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} de dany radiant.
El dany del conjur incrementa en {@dice 1d6} quan arribes a nivell 5 ({@damage 2d6}), nivell 11 ({@damage 3d6}) i nivell 17 ({@damage 4d6})

spell.name: Elixir Sanador (UA)
entries: You create a elixir sanador in a simple vial that appears in your hand. The elixir retains its potency for the duration or until it's consumed, at which point the vial vanishes.
As an action, a creature can drink the elixir or administer it to another creature. The drinker regains {@dice 2d4 + 2} hit points.

spell.name: Infestació (UA)
entries: Fas aparèixer un núvol de puces, paparres i d'altres paràsits que envolt a una criatura que puguis veure a l'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució. Si falla rep {@damage 1d6} de dany de verí i es mou 5 peus en una direcció aleatoria Tira un {@dice d8}: 1, nord; 2, nord-est; 3, est; 4, sud-est; 5, sud; 6, sud-oest; 7, oest; 8, nort-oest.
El dany del conjur incrementa en {@dice 1d6} quan arribes a nivell 5 ({@damage 2d6}), nivell 11 ({@damage 3d6}) i nivell 17 ({@damage 4d6})

spell.name: Primal Savagery (UA)
entries: Your teeth or fingernails lengthen and sharpen. You choose which. Make a melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} piercing or slashing damage (your choice). After you make the attack, your teeth or fingernails return to normal.
El dany del conjur incrementa en {@dice 1d10} quan arribes a nivell 5 ({@damage 2d10}), nivell 11 ({@damage 3d10}) i nivell 17 ({@damage 4d10})

spell.name: Puppet (UA)
entries: Your gesture forces one humanoid you can see within range to make a Constitució saving throw. On a failed save, the target must move up to its speed in a direction you choose. In addition, you can cause the target to drop whatever it is holding. This spell has no effect on a humanoid that is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

spell.name: Sense Emotion (UA)
entries: You attune your senses to pick up the emotions of others for the duration. When you cast the spell, and as your action on each turn until the spell ends, you can focus your senses on one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you. You instantly learn the target's prevailing emotion, whether it's love, anger, pain, fear, calm, or something else. If the target isn't actually humanoid or it is immune to being {@condition charmed}, you sense that it is calm.

spell.name: Snare (UA)

m.text: 30 feet of cord or rope, which is consumed by the spell

entries: While you cast this spell, you use the cord or rope to create a circle with a 5-foot radius on a flat surface within your reach. When you finish casting, the cord or rope disappears to become a magical trap.

The trap is nearly invisible and requires a successful Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC to be found. The trap triggers when a Small creature or larger moves into the area protected by the spell.

The triggering creature must succeed on a Destresa saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and be hoisted into the air until it hangs upside down 3 feet above the protected surface, where it is {@condition restrained}.

The {@condition restrained} creature can make a Destresa saving throw with disadvantage at the end of each of its turns and ends the {@condition restrained} effect on a success. Alternatively, another creature that can reach the {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to make an Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) check against your spell save DC. On a success, the {@condition restrained} effect also ends.

spell.name: Sudden Awakening (UA)
entries: Each sleeping creature you choose within range awakens, and then each {@condition prone} creature within range can stand up without expending any movement.

spell.name: Toll the Dead (UA)
entries: You point at one creature you can see within range, and the sound of a dolorous bell fills the air around it for a moment. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa or take {@damage 1d8} de dany necròtic. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes {@damage 1d12} de dany necròtic.
The spell's damage increases by one die when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8} or {@damage 2d12}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8} or {@damage 3d12}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8} or {@damage 4d12}).

spell.name: Unearthly Chorus (UA)
entries: Music of a style you choose fills the air around you in a 30-foot radius. The music s'extèn per les cantonades and can be heard from up to 100 feet away. The music moves with you, centered on you for the duration.

Until the spell ends, you make Carisma ({@skill Performance}) checks with advantage. In addition, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to beguile one creature you choose within 30 feet of you that can see you and hear the music. The creature ha de salvar per Carisma. If you or your companions are attacking it, the creature automatically succeeds on the saving throw. On a failure, the creature becomes friendly to you for as long as it can hear the music and for 1 hour thereafter. You make Carisma ({@skill Deception}) checks and Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks against creatures made friendly by this spell with advantage.

spell.name: Virtue (UA)
entries: You touch one creature, imbuing it with vitality. If the target has at least 1 hit point, it gains a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. The temporary hit points are lost when the spell ends.

spell.name: Wild Cunning (UA)
entries: You call out to the spirits of nature to aid you. When you cast this spell, choose one of the following effects:

items: If there are any tracks on the ground within range, you know where they are, and you make Saviesa ({@skill Survival}) checks to follow these tracks with advantage for 1 hour or until you cast this spell again.
If there is edible forage within range, you know it and where to find it.
If there is clean drinking water within range, you know it and where to find it.
If there is suitable shelter for you and your companions with range, you know it and where to find.

Send the spirits to bring back wood for a fire and to set up a campsite in the area using your supplies. The spirits build the fire in a circle of stones, put up tents, unroll bedrolls, and put out any rations and water for consumption.
Have the spirits instantly break down a campsite, which includes putting out a fire, taking down tents, packing up bags, and burying any rubbish.

spell.name: Zephyr Strike (UA)
entries: You move like the wind. For the duration, your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
In addition, the first time you make a weapon attack on your turn before the spell ends, you make the attack roll with advantage, and your speed increases by 30 feet until the end of that turn.
